greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (a(q) - a(q^2) - 4*a(q^4) + 4*a(q^8)) / 6 in powers of q where a() is a cubic AGM theta function.
comment: Cubic AGM theta functions: a(q) (see A004016), b(q) (A005928), c(q) (A005882).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Michael Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of eta(q) * eta(q^3) * eta(q^4)^4 * eta(q^24)^2 / (eta(q^2) * eta(q^8) * eta(q^12))^2 in powers of q.
a(n) is multiplicative with a(2) = -1, a(2^e) = -3 * (-1)^e if e>1, a(3^e) = 1, a(p^e) = e+1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e)/2 if p == 5 (mod 6).
G.f. is a period 1 Fourier series which satisfies f(-1 / (24 t)) = 12^(1/2) (t/i) g(t) where q = exp(2 Pi i t) and g() is the g.f. for A123484.
Expansion of q * f(-q, -q) * f(q^2, q^10) / f(-q, -q^5)^2 in powers of q where f(, ) is Ramanujan's general theta function. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 12 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, DivisorSum[ n, (Mod[#, 2] - 4 Boole[Mod[#, 8] == 4]) KroneckerSymbol[ -3, n/#] &]]; (* _Michael Somos_, Oct 12 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = my(A); if( n<1, 0, n--; A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( eta(x + A) * eta(x^3+A) * eta(x^4 + A)^4 * eta(x^24 + A)^2 / ( eta(x^2 + A) * eta(x^8+A) * eta(x^12+A) )^2, n))};
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, sumdiv(n, d, ((d%2) -4 * (d%8==4)) * kronecker(-3, n/d)))};
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Jan 22 2008
